summary: This document is an internal email correspondence from Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. regarding a classification matter. It includes a forwarded message from Amanda Kirby to Seldon Clarke, discussing an attachment related to IRS TIN numbers. The content is marked as confidential and for internal use only.

persons.name: Seldon Clarke
persons.context: Seldon Clarke is involved in the internal email correspondence regarding a classification matter.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the sender of the original email discussing the IRS TIN number and forwarding it to Seldon Clarke.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby, an associate, is communicating with Seldon Clarke, indicating a professional relationship within Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
It discusses a classification matter related to IRS TIN numbers.
The content is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
